item.title: 'A very, very small number' of teens receive gender-affirming care, study finds

item.title: U.S. Steel sues to salvage its sale to Japan's Nippon Steel

item.title: Canada's Justin Trudeau says he will resign as party leader and prime minister
item.description: Trudeau's decision after almost a decade in power sets the stage for a succession fight to select a new prime minister.
